Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Orthopedic \Or`tho*ped"ic\, Orthopedical \Or`tho*ped"ic*al\, a. (Med.) Of, pertaining to, or employed in, orthopedics; relating to the prevention or cure of deformities of children, or, in general, of the human body at any age; as, orthopedic surgery; an orthopedic hospital. [1913 Webster]
orthopedic adj : of or relating to or employed in orthopedics; "orthopedic shoes" [syn: {orthopaedic}, {orthopedical}]
